forecast.day_comments: Mostly cloudy, with a steady temperature around 25. West southwest wind around 5 mph.
forecast.night_comments: A 20 percent chance of snow after 2pm.  Mostly cloudy, with a high near 32. West southwest wind 3 to 6 mph.

forecast.day_comments: A 20 percent chance of snow after 2pm.  Mostly cloudy, with a high near 31. Calm wind becoming west around 6 mph in the afternoon.
